custom-sql.sql: SELECT {CTEntry.*} FROM CTEntry INNER JOIN CTCollections_CTEntries ON CTCollections_CTEntries.ctEntryId = CTEntry.ctEntryId WHERE CTCollections_CTEntries.ctCollectionId = ?

SELECT {CTProcess.*} FROM CTProcess INNER JOIN CTCollection ON CTProcess.ctCollectionId = CTCollection.ctCollectionId INNER JOIN BackgroundTask ON CTProcess.backgroundTaskId = BackgroundTask.backgroundTaskId WHERE (CTProcess.companyId = ?) AND (BackgroundTask.status = ?) ORDER BY CTProcess.createDate DESC
